cast.overview: A cover-up that spanned four U.S. Presidents pushed the country's first female newspaper publisher and a hard-driving editor to join an unprecedented battle between journalist and government. Inspired by true events.
cast.title: The Post

details.biography: Angus Hepburn  (born in Edinburgh, Scotland) is a Scottish actor and voice artist, known for appearing in 30 Rock, The Comedy, Royal Pains, The Blacklist, Billions and The Surgeon. Hepburn however is primarily a theatre actor, having been in that business since the 1970s.
details.name: Angus Hepburn
